#summary A guide to creating a mod using the map creator.

= Mod Creation Guide =

This page is a guide to creating a mod from an existing xml file.

1. Open the second part of the map creator.

2. Press the 'Load' button in the bottom-left.

3. Locate the xml file to base your mod off of.

4. Locate the 'centers.txt' file if the program asks for it.

5. If you have access to the map's image, locate it and continue.

6. The program will now load all the contents of the xml file into the program.

7. Go to each step that you want to change something on and edit the information.

8. Click the 'Save' button in the bottom-left and select where you want to save the edited xml file.

9. Click 'Save' and you're done!
